attributes.title: This app killed my family
attributes.review: I just wanted to stay informed on important political news, especially regarding our great exalted dictator, I mean president. Then family members started calling me racist and homophobic and karen 😫 and I couldn't handle it. Why do liberals have to be so much smarter and use facts in their arguments? Shame.

attributes.title: ⚠️WARNING DO NOT DOWNLOAD⚠️
attributes.review: don’t download this app, it made my phone crash and i couldn’t get it to work 😔 it also wiped my phone clean i have no pictures and apps no NOTHING. what’s also really weird is that it keeps saying “make america great again” even after i deleted it. stay safe DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: Hmmm
attributes.review: I wonder why all these people are not liking an app where is a free speech space for  trump.👀 I l like the free speech aspect of that app, you know kinda like tick tock. That app has so many inspirational people and future creators!! Like me, I use Tick Tock to help people and share inspirational qoutes, positivity ect ect ect because that’s what people need.

attributes.title: do NOT get this app
attributes.review: i got hacked and my phone does not work. Once I downloaded this app , it said I purchased items and charged my card for over 150 dollars worth of items !😡 I WANT MY MONEY BACK ! I talked to corporate and they said there was nothing they could do and we’re very rude !!! I’m so furious.

attributes.title: Feel the bern
attributes.review: I’m so confused because I thought I downloaded Trump 2020 app but it turned out to be Trump and some foreign flag in the background. I’m so confused? Like does trump not support America or Americans? Why do I have to give my president my phone number to sign up for this app? I’m underage. Hmmm... there seems to be a pattern...

attributes.title: Soliciting money never ends
attributes.review: After downloading this app, I have been receiving multiple text messages every day criticizing me for how much I’ve donated so far and asking me to donate more. If you want to be harassed, this is the app for you. Also, Trump is going to lose anyway.

attributes.title: 💫✨🧚‍♀️IRRESPONSIBLE🧚‍♀️✨💫
attributes.review: Those who created this app were very irresponsible with the images and colors they used. The color scheme was very hurtful to my eyes. Especially the ✨orange✨. My eyes have become very damaged due to the bright orange nature of many of the images. I hope that nobody’s eyes have to go through the trauma that mine have...😔

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Worst app EVER!! I downloaded it to see what our president is up to and it immediately crashed my phone. Ever since then I have been getting weird calls and texts saying that ‘they’ know where I am and they’re coming for me. Whatever you do, don’t download this app 😭

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is so terrible it took me days to download it this app is so buggy it keeps making my phone lag and while it was downloading i was locked out of my phone and i cold not use it until it was done this app needs to be taken down

attributes.title: The worst
attributes.review: I couldn’t beleive this app. It took a 29 weeks to download. Then my phone exploded. I was terrified 😓☹️ I thought I was going to die then my whole family was taken away in cages because all lives matter i am very confused and scared wished I never downloaded this app
